name: Blueberry Bread
author: Sherri Ann
summary: Blueberry bread made with fresh blueberries and a little tang of lemon and orange.
ingredients: 1 ½ tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice
directions: Mix boiling water and butter for bread in a small bowl; set aside until butter has melted and mixture has cooled, about 30 minutes
Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Combine blueberries and 2 tablespoons flour in a bowl; toss to coat
Sift remaining flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a separate bowl
Add sugar, orange juice, cooled butter mixture, lemon juice, and eggs to the flour mixture; mix until well combined
Divide batter and pour into the prepared loaf pans
Combine sugar, flour, softened butter, and cinnamon for topping in a small bowl
Mix with a fork until combined and crumbly
Sprinkle on top of the 2 loaves
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 55 to 60 minutes
